New Records: India scored 199/2, their highest score in the series.
Ishan Kishan scored 89 runs, the highest individual score in the match.
Key Match Events: Dominant batting performance by India, especially in the powerplay and middle overs.
Sri Lanka's batting struggled, scoring only 137/6.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Match held at Bharat Ratna Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Cricket Stadium, Lucknow.
Ishan Kishan was named Player of the Match.
